Application.Name: Tuner
Application.Author: Ahmed Zamouche
Application.Description:
Browse radio stations streaming live on the internet. Features: Access the web interface from a local machine. And remotely play your favourites stations. Filter stations according to your needs. Customise the look of Tuner. Favourites management.
NB: Help keep this site up to date, please email me with any corrections. New additions are always welcome, but only FM/AM stations also streaming online, no internet-only stations please. Also available as web service at http://nmt-radio.co.cc medzam@gmail.com
Application.UsageInstructions: If you want to add your owns stations, edit the stations.xml file. Don't forget to disable the automatic updates of the contab.sh

Application.Name: Mono.Wrapper
Application.Author: journey4712
Application.Description: This program is called mono.wrapper. When used together with a static jukebox like YAMJ or MLMJ stored on your internal disk you will no longer have to worry about a share being mounted to play a video off of it. The software is configured to work with all configured NMT shares, NFS and SMB.

Application.Name: lighttpd
Application.Author: journey4712
Application.Description: lighttpd replaces the web server on port 9999. The effect is that any php program that runs on port 9999 will run much faster than through the stock NMT webserver. Any application that runs entirely on port 9999 should have a much snappier/faster interface. Requests that used to take a second or two should be shortened to a (large)fraction of a second. The programmers using lighttpd also have more development options(image generation/manipulation, https support, debugging support, xml transformation via xslt, more) than they did with the stock php server.

Application.Name: CouchpotatoV2
Application.Author: RuudBurger
Application.Description: CouchPotato is an automatic NZB and torrent downloader. You can keep a "movies I want"-list and it will search for NZBs/torrents of these movies every X hours. Once a movie is found, it will send it to SABnzbd or download the .nzb or .torrent to a specified directory.
Application.UsageInstructions: BEFORE installing CouchPotato, you MUST have installed "local" with C.S.I The interface can be found at http://PCH-IP:5050

Application.Name: SickBeard
Application.Author: midgetspy
Application.Description: SickBeard is a PVR for newsgroup users (with limited torrent support). It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows and when they are posted it downloads them, sorts and renames them, and optionally generates metadata for them. It currently supports NZBs.org, NZBMatrix, NZBs'R'Us, Newzbin, Womble's Index, NZB.su, TVTorrents and EZRSS and retrieves show information from theTVDB.com and TVRage.com.
Application.UsageInstructions: BEFORE installing SickBeard, you MUST have installed "local" with C.S.I The interface can be found at http://PCH-IP:8081

Application.Name: SickRage
Application.Author: echel0n
Application.Description: SickBeard is a PVR for newsgroup and torrent users. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows and when they are posted it downloads them, sorts and renames them, and optionally generates metadata for them. It currently supports NZBs.org, NZBMatrix, NZBs'R'Us, Newzbin, Womble's Index, NZB.su, TVTorrents and EZRSS and retrieves show information from theTVDB.com and TVRage.com.
Application.UsageInstructions: The interface can be found at http://PCH-IP:8081

Application.Name: Telnetd
Application.Author: Ger Teunis
Application.Description: Прочесть! После обновления или реинсталляции, перезапустите NMT. Это полный набор для доступа к Linux вашего NMT. Содержит talnet daemon и полный BusyBox и Midnight Commander.

Application.Name: NZBget
Application.Author: hugbug
Application.Description: Тестовый релиз! Устанавливает последнюю тестовую версию NZBget, оптимизированную для NZB. Также содержит оптимизированный UNRAR 3.80 и PAP2.

Application.Name: NZBget
Application.Author: hugbug
Application.Description: Тестовый релиз! Устанавливает последнюю тестовую версию NZBget, оптимизированную для NZB. Также содержит оптимизированный UNRAR 3.80 и PAP2.

Index.Name: Popdex
Index.Author: Courtenay Probert
Index.Description:
Popdex is a custom menu based on xbmc aeon theme.
Features ------------ - Customisable Backdrops - 3 Menus [Main, Services, Hidden] - Date
The hidden menu can be configured to activated after a certain time or can be enabled via a pincode (default = 1425)
Customize ------------ - 1st read index.readme.txt - Edit: index.menu.js - Customize shortcuts to your preferred locations - Add your own backdrops to /Photo/_index_/backdrops/ (image resolution 1100x619)
Index.Changelog: Moved the hidden menu activation codes to the index.menu.js for easy configuration
